text: For Happiness () is a 1917 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yevgeny Bauer.Зодчие, синоптики, киношники. Какими были городские «первопроходцы» РязаниБиография Льва Кулешова It stars Emma Bauer, Tasya Borman, and N. Dennitsyna. == Actors == * Emma Bauer as The girl * Tasya Borman as Lee, her daughter * N. Dennitsyna as Lee's nurse * Aleksandr Kheruvimov as Doctor * Lidiya Koreneva as Zoya Verenskaya, rich widow == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1917 movies
title: For Happiness
